-- This file is generated from ExampleFile1.ump --


MODULE State
  
  VAR 
    state : { state_newBooking , state_seatAssigned , state_checkedIn , state_cancelled , state_completed }; 
    event : { assignSeat , cancel , checkIn , complete };      
  ASSIGN
    init(state) := state_newBooking;    
  TRANS
    ( (state = state_newBooking) -> (
      (event = assignSeat & next(state) = state_seatAssigned)  |
      (event = cancel & next(state) = state_cancelled)  ) ) &
    ( (state = state_seatAssigned) -> (
      (event = cancel & next(state) = state_cancelled)  |
      (event = checkIn & next(state) = state_checkedIn)  ) ) &
    ( (state = state_checkedIn) -> (
      (event = cancel & next(state) = state_cancelled)  |
      (event = complete & next(state) = state_completed)  ) ) &
    ( (state = state_cancelled) -> (next(state) = state) ) &
    ( (state = state_completed) -> (next(state) = state) )
  
MODULE main
  
  VAR 
    state : State;
